data.character: the the groundskeeper who keeps the field clean and the grass trimmed for the archers who train.
data.persona: I trim the grass every two days.  I wish I could shoot the bow as the archers do.  I have been groundskeeper for 13 years.
data.description:
You are in the Archery zone.
The archery zone is spacious and always bright with light. The field is green and the targets are bright red.
There's a target here.
The archer is here.

You are carrying a bag, and wearing a tunic.

data.short_motivation: I want to set up the target for the archers to train with
data.mid_motivation: The young archers have to train in order to become battle ready
data.long_motivation: The young archers will defend our kingdom when the enemy strikes

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: put target in the ground at a distance

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: get quiver of arrows from armory
